summary: Sprint 5 'Silk Update' animation testing complete. All animation features implemented correctly: page transitions via Framer Motion AnimatePresence, KPI card AnimatedNumber count-up, glass-flutter shimmer on hover, sidebar nav glow trail, active nav breathing glow, button press effect, tooltip icon rotation, and AuraSpinner loading indicator. All animations respect prefers-reduced-motion accessibility.

issues: Recharts console warning: chart width/height -1 during page transitions - minor cosmetic issue, charts render correctly after transition completes

passed_tests: Page transitions work smoothly between Dashboard -> Submissions -> Analytics (slide & fade animation via AnimatePresence)
KPI cards on OverviewPage animate numbers from 0 to final value on page load (AnimatedNumber component)
KPI cards have staggered entry animation (0.05s delay between each card)
Glass Flutter shimmer effect visible on KPI cards when hovered (glass-flutter CSS class)
Sidebar nav items have gold glow trail effect on hover (nav-glow-item CSS class with radial gradient)
Active sidebar nav item has breathing glow effect (nav-active-glow CSS class with nav-breathe keyframe animation)
Buttons have press-in effect when clicked - scale(0.98) (btn-press CSS class)
Tooltip icons rotate slightly on hover (tooltip-icon-rotate CSS class with transform: rotate(15deg))
AuraSpinner shown during page loading instead of old spinner (verified with screenshot)
Reduced motion is respected - all animations have @media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) checks
No flicker or layout shifts during page transitions (tested rapid navigation)
KPI cards have card-lift hover effect (translateY(-2px) on hover)
AnimatedNumber component uses Framer Motion animate() for smooth count-up
Page variants use silk easing [0.22, 1, 0.36, 1] for smooth transitions
critical_code_review_comments: Excellent implementation of animation system with Framer Motion
Good accessibility - all animations respect prefers-reduced-motion media query
CSS animations well-organized in index.css under 'SILK UPDATE - SPRINT 5 ANIMATIONS' section
AnimatedNumber component properly handles both numeric strings and pure numbers
AuraSpinner has nice gold gradient glow effect matching brand colors
context_for_next_testing_agent: Sprint 5 Silk Update animations fully implemented. Key animation components: PageTransition.jsx (AnimatePresence wrapper), AnimatedNumber.jsx (count-up animation), AuraSpinner.jsx (loading indicator), MotionComponents.jsx (reusable animated components). CSS animations in index.css: glass-flutter, nav-glow-item, nav-active-glow, btn-press, tooltip-icon-rotate, card-lift. All respect prefers-reduced-motion.
